segments.text: It will do you good to go out for entertainment at weekends.What kind of movie do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard to say , I like interesting and significant ones . I don't care whether they're blockbusters or not .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Shall we go downtown for a movie this Friday evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure . Let me give a call to find out .
segments.speaker: S1
